DOC.brief_title: Carmustine Plus O6-benzylguanine Treating Patients With Recurrent Progressive Glioma
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine activity carmustine O6-benzylguanine patient recurrent progressive glioblastoma multiforme , anaplastic astrocytoma , gliosarcoma resistant nitrosourea . II . Determine toxic effect regimen patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive O6-benzylguanine IV 1 hour , follow 1 hour later carmustine IV 1 hour day 1 . Treatment repeat every 6 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 18-32 patient accrue study within 12-18 month .
